column4: i have an entry in crontab that was created by ubuntu upon installation, and it has the dow set to 7. I thought it only went from 0(sun) to 6(mon) ?
0 and 7 are both Sunday (`man 5 crontab` is the manpage that covers this) because it works out better that way (Sunday first and Monday first both make sense numerically)
thanks for your help... must have missed that.
